hotels.title: Historic Spanish Boutique Escape in the Heart of Seville
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the heart of Seville at the exquisite Gravina 51 Hotel, a luxurious boutique retreat nestled within the city's historic district. This architectural gem, with its blend of traditional charm and modern elegance, is a stone's throw from iconic landmarks such as the Seville Cathedral and the Alcazar Palace. Enjoy Andalusian cuisine at Bar 51, and later unwind with a glass of wine in hand, in a city where culture, gastronomy, and luxury perfectly converge.
